```markdown
---
title: "Ecological Analysis - Project A"
---

```{r}
# Fake Ecological Data
eco_data <- data.frame(
  region = c("Region A", "Region B", "Region C"),
  tree_cover_pct = c(35.2, 48.1, 29.4),
  rainfall_mm = c(1200, 950, 1400),
  biodiversity_index = c(0.72, 0.65, 0.83)
)

# Table
knitr::kable(eco_data, caption = "Ecological Indicators by Region")



# Plot
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(eco_data, aes(x = region, y = tree_cover_pct)) +
  geom_col(fill = "forestgreen") +
  labs(title = "Tree Cover by Region", y = "Tree Cover (%)", x = "Region")
